description:
Get the most out of your iOS Device(s) running iOS 8 with this in-depth iOS 8 video training course! Great for anyone new to iOS or those wanting to become more familiar and efficient with iOS 8 in general.

  • Over four hours of HD Video Tutorials contained in 60+ lessons!
  • Both an iPad and iPhone are used together when needed to display differences in the interfaces!
  • Direct screen captures. No hand moving around in front of the screen blocking your
  • Simple interface that makes is easy to navigate through the course.
  • The viewer is guided the with zooms and highlights of what is being discussed.
title: Learn: iOS 8 Edition
